name: Sanctuary (Benjamin.Phillips)
description:
Sanctuary is a collaborative project that was designed around it's music. Take control of a bird, and fly around the landscape, finding friends and flying free!

Game Design/Programmer - Benjamin Phillips
https://twitter.com/Benn7495

Audio Design - Yasmin Amir Hamzah
https://yasminamirhamzah.wixsite.com/audio

Models - Daniel Jardine
